title: Steve Harvey's Daughter Shows Off Luxury Bag Before Bev Hills Hit & Run
text:
Steve Harvey's daughter was touting her luxury lifestyle just before she flipped her SUV and allegedly tried to run from the scene.

22-year-old Lori Harvey was having a normal Sunday Funday before the dramatic end to her night.

She met up with a friend at Nobu in Malibu for a delicious meal overlooking the sun setting on the ocean and took some snaps to commemorate the day.

Related:

Miss Universe 2017

Harvey, who was recently romantically linked to Diddy, first showed off her luxury Balmain bag on her Instagram Story.

The green crocodile skin bag was highlighted against the ocean backdrop and even included a Malibu location tag for maximum clout.

Harvey also showed fans the picturesque Malibu sunset outside Nobu, one of the many reasons to frequent the popular restaurant.

Her friend, model Amaya Colon, shared some video of Harvey smiling and blowing kisses into the camera while revealing their "Nobu date."
